title: ZoomText  9.11.0.112
description:
Integrated magnification and screen reading for vision impaired computer users.


I found this on another site and wanted to share it here since there appears to be no free windows based application that allows full screen magnification.  i don&#039;t think it works on vista but tried and tested on xp with no problems.

small file, clear instructions in the readme file, easy & quick install - go offline before running it first time though to ensure that the software doesn&#039;t try to update.

i dont know what languages are supported(if any) other than english.
